name: Easy Vegan Potato Vegetable Soup
author: vewohl
summary: This is a very easy, thick vegetable soup with potatoes, carrot, and sweet potatoes. If you like, you can add some soy cream. If you like your soup thinner, add more vegetable broth.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1 pinch ground nutmeg, or more to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat and cook onion until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes
Add potatoes, carrots, sweet potato, and vegetable broth and bring to a boil
Cover, reduce heat, and simmer until potatoes are soft, about 20 minutes
Puree vegetables with an immersion blender until smooth
Season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg
